title: Alberta hotel claims chlorine suspected cause after children fall ill at pool
desc: About a dozen children were rushed to hospital on Sunday after many of them suddenly fell ill following a swim at a hotel pool in the town of Canmore, Alta.

title: Pakistan's inflation to remain within 5-6pc range in January
desc: Both S&P and SBP projections echo the governmentâ€™s assessment that macroeconomic conditions are stabilizing, as Pakistan seeks to attract foreign investment and push toward export-led growth

title: Pilot in fatal Gold Coast plane crash identified as Greg Ackman as air safety experts assess scene
desc: The aircraft came down shortly after take-off from the Jacobs Well Airstrip on Tuesday killing 73-year-old pilot Greg Ackman and his male passenger.

title: Broncos fire OC Joe Lombardi after AFC title game loss
desc: Broncos offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi was fired Tuesday along with wide receivers coach Keary Colbert and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch.

title: Who is South Korea's former first lady?
desc: Kim Keon Hee, wife of disgraced former president Yoon Suk Yeol, is facing court on a raft of charges.

title: ANZ NZ economists cut annual house price growth forecast
desc: ANZ NZ cuts house price growth forecast citing a lack of near-term momentum in the market

title: Microsoft vows to make "behind-the-scenes platform changes" as it begins testing next phase of Windows 11
desc: After a rough few weeks, Microsoft has promised to make behind-the-scenes platform changes to Windows 11 as it begins testing the next wave of features.

title: Former Australian neo-Nazi group member who owned 16 guns appeals loss of firearms licence
desc: Joshua Ryan Hoath, 27, argues his political views should not have been considered by Queensland police

title: Netanyahu: Israeli soldiers lost their lives in Gaza due to Biden-era arms embargo
desc: In incendiary allegation, premier says IDF 'didn't have enough ammunition,' but 'embargo' ended when Trump took office; furious Biden aides say claim 'categorically false,' PM 'ungrateful'

title: Dublin pub in 'sadly missed' tributes to 'legendary' barman & 'great character' after death as pals & family heartbroken
desc: POPULAR Harry Byrnes Pub on Dublin's Howth Rd has paid tributes to Mulligans Pub of Poolbeg St barman Noel Hawkins.
